729406f-a.text:
Richmond Road, south side, between Tysens Lane nnd Wilder Avenue, showing "Cedar Villa," the home of H. Charles Miller (1925). It was owned by A.E. Crute in 1917 and by John McCarthy in 1907 and 1898. Dates refer to maps
on which the names of the owners appear.
July, 1925
P. L. Sperr
729406f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Tysens Lane, Staten Island, NY
